column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Does the " mensalão " continue ?
#Text=Not in the exact manner it was managed before , however I believe that it still exists .
#Text=The election of Aldo [ Aldo Rebelo ( PCdoB ) ] for the Presidency of Congress is an example .
#Text=Do you believe Lula did know about the mensalão ?
#Text=Certainly he knew and he is part of the ruling and creation of the scheme .
#Text=Otherwise he will enter to History as the most ignorant among all of the Brazilian presidents .
#Text=What was the role of the ex-minister and deputy José Dirceu , in you opinion ?
#Text=Operator , chief of government and chief of its strategies .
#Text=He and Lula created the scheme of " mensalão " .
#Text=He , Lula , Hugo Chávez and Fidel Castro created a scheme to turn out South America as a huge continent for the world-wide left .
#Text=The first step was Lula in Brazil , next Evo Morales in Bolivia , and so on .
#Text=Jose Dirceu was a part of that .
#Text=Do you think that the corruption scandal will end " much ado about nothing " or " pizza " as it is said in Brazil ?

column1: #Text=Actually there are a lot of " pizzas " .
#Text=One has already being served : the Vote Buying CPI .
#Text=They are still trying to serve the others .
#Text=But I think that it will end in nothing ; they , the politicians , are very cooperative with each other .
#Text=They [ the deputies ] know that their days are numbered , mainly the ones from big cities .
#Text=As for the ones from provincial and small cities ; they do n't even know what a computer is and they did n't realize the severity of the problem .
#Text=They think that if their name did n't appear in the newspaper , their names are not in any place .
#Text=Perhaps I 'll create a site closer to the elections , when I will put the names of all incompetent ones from the National Congress .
#Text=What will end in nothing ?
#Text=The investigations or the scandal ?
#Text=The investigations will continue until an acceptable limit is reached by the major parties : the Workers Party and the Social Democracy Party .
#Text=Then they must stop when it is " enough " for the population .
#Text=Popular reaction
#Text=In the streets , how do ordinary Brazilian people see this issue ?
#Text=Everybody is disappointed because people thought that everything ( corruption , politicians etc ) would change .
#Text=And it really changed , but for the worse .
#Text=The amateur behaviour of the communications team of President Lula contributed very much to this also ; it lacked professionalism .
#Text=Are the people who live in Brasilia too upset ?
#Text=Nobody gets very upset about the government in Brasilia .
#Text=Most of the town population works for the federal government , so this is a unique city , really .
#Text=And it is beautiful .
